scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=development && gulp build:tsconfig && webpack --watch --debug false
scripts.prod: rm -rf ./dist/client && export NODE_ENV=production && gulp build:tsconfig && webpack --debug false --environment production
scripts.newversion: npm run prod && node publish.js && cd ./publish && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run newversiongit && npm publish ./
scripts.newversiongit: git add --all  && git commit -m "New version $npm_package_version. Read more https://github.com/xdan/kaliostro/CHANGELOG.MD" && git tag $npm_package_version && git push --tags origin master
